note: Threshold scales used by TFPT RG pipelines (mt→UV only policy). Values are taken from paper v1.06 / the E8Cascade_TFPT_G8_Enhanced_v2.yaml blueprint unless stated otherwise.
notes: In the mt→UV-only debug policy, thresholds below mt are not used.
G8 is implemented as a 1-loop Δb3=+2 patch above MG8 unless a dedicated PyR@TE model including G8 is used.
Right-handed neutrino thresholds (MNR1..3) are used for stepwise activation of Dirac Yukawa columns in the PMNS pipeline.
MPhi is set to the TFPT axion/PQ claim scale f_a≈8.86×10^10 GeV (see tfpt_suite/data/axion_tfpt_v106.json). If you need the legacy n=4 placeholder scale (~10^16 GeV), override MPhi explicitly.
